right_description: Consumer may confirm whether controller is processing their personal data and access such personal data in a portable and readily usable format.
Consumer may correct inaccuracies in their personal data taking into account the nature and purposes of processing.
Consumer may delete personal data provided by or obtained about the consumer subject to exceptions for legal obligations, public health, and abuse detection.
Consumer may obtain a copy of personal data previously provided to controller in a portable and to the extent technically feasible readily usable format that allows transmission to another entity.

Consumer may opt out of: (I) targeted advertising; (II) sale of personal data; (III) profiling in furtherance of decisions that produce legal or similarly significant effects. UOOM signals must be honored immediately.
response_deadline_days: Immediate for UOOM; 45 for direct requests
